====== store ======
{#JAPI Joomla.Framework Cache JCacheStorageApc::store #}

Store the data to APC by id and group

===== Syntax =====
boolean store	( **$id**, **$group**, **$data** )

| **$id** | string | The cache data id |
| **$group** | string | The cache data group |
| **$data** | string | The data to store in cache |

===== Examples =====
<code php|Example>

</code>
